title: Decline - VERSION 11 Update Available
content:
==========
VERSION 11 BETA OUT
===========



[url=http://www.stephenarnott.plus.com/files/decline_v11.rar]Decline Version 11 BETA[/url] is now out. Thank you grafix for uploading this file onto your server [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]




Features in V11

* Music
* More items
* More sound effects
* Production intro screen
* Updated graphics (Background & Points & Sprites)
* Standard anti-aliasing
* Sub-point counter & +- Counter on GUI
* New Hazard (Bird, also rotates with movement)
* Point effects (Fade out & Shows value)
* Lifes (With sound & Gems With sound and gem-score drawer)
* Updated physics
* Updates hazard physics
* Faster scrolling
* Smooth scrolling
* Points gradually fly faster
* Realistic distant background
* Fixed ending

Features not included (yet to come)

* Random weather (rain, thunder, night etc.)
* Water & Swimming
* Main menu
* Total score
* Dynamic background
* Online high-score board
* Other...

[img]http://img154.echo.cx/img154/9328/declineversion113ti.jpg[/img]----------------------
LEX says: Goodbye

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
im getting kicked off the computer [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] ----------------------
LEX says: Goodbye

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-stoned.gif[/img] -----------------
[img]http://members.lycos.nl/holydjaser/signature.JPG[/img]

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
Happens to all of us...

Oh no, now i'm getting kicked off! [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
Heheh... laptops are cool. Having a laptop in my room makes it near-impossible for me to be kicked off.
My [url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?grafix5000]MindBending Power[/url] is 5.43 points.
Go to [url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url] to see my site!

[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
As long as my school performance is good, I get all the time in the world.------------------------------------------------------
Keep in mind, I'm not an artist.

"Take evasive action!"

title: Re: Good news everyone
content: As long as I keep off the drugz, I get all the time in the world until someone else wants the computer.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Good news everyone
content: Grrg, you lucky ones with ten powerful computers in your home.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] Life.. It's worth 20000 points!

title: Re: Good news everyone
content: Yeah right KR, I have two computers--one's lucky if it can open Internet Explorer and the other's a semi-ok XP.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
yea even if my parents wanted to turn off all the power to the computers (which the never have for 4 years to me)
my ibook has a wireless card and can leach off my neighbours internet ^^

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
Well you don't really have to write so many "!!!". Besides there isn't even a demo out. From the screenshot above, I see some improvements, but it looks like a Photoshop work to me. Anywa I.m looking forward to see more.----

I <3 Greta

title: Re: Good news everyone
content: Keen collects falling candy while dodging big flame things? Am i right?[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
Or maybe there are springs (like in Sonic).----

I <3 Greta

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
My first thought was Asteroid clone, but who knows.
(Don't answer that.)Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten.

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr] Keen collects falling candy while dodging big flame things? Am i right? [hr][/quote]

WOW, very close, its actually the opposite.----------------------
LEX says: Goodbye

title: Re: Good news everyone
content: He dodges Candy while collecting falling flame things?[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]He dodges Candy while collecting falling flame things? [hr][/quote]

... why would keen collect flames and dodge candy [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img]

by opposite i meant keens falling and collection candy [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] ----------------------
LEX says: Goodbye

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
Oh, I get it now. So he's falling down, and he falls towards the candy? Hopefully the background will scroll too.
My [url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?grafix5000]MindBending Power[/url] is 5.43 points.
Go to [url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url] to see my site!

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
it does, and its surprisingly long [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] ----------------------
LEX says: Goodbye

title: Re: Good news everyone
content:
because im happy so far with the results and the way this game is looking, ive decided to dedicate more time to it and therefore take it more seriously, this means updated resolution, graphics, and maybe longer gameplay + additional features. a BETA version should be available this month (if a BETA is released) either way, i am certain that it will be done before the end of february at the very latest (but hey, i could be wrong)----------------------
LEX says: Goodbye

title: Re: Good news everyone
content: Well, good luck with that plan. (I'm extremely familiar with time-delays. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] )Life.. It's worth 20000 points!
